alert.note: Alert for Brooks (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Brooks County through 400 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near El Coyote Ranch Airport, or 11 miles west of Rachal, developing in place with additional cells drifting east. HAZARD...Torrential rains with low visibility and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Visibility along FM 755 and nearby roads could drop to less than one half mile and ponding of water is expected. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Brooks County along and near FM 755 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
